actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to make a supplemental appropriation for the Administrator of General Services to enable him to plan, design, and construct an official residence for the Vice President of the United States in the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Appropriates $750,000 for the Administrator of General Services for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975, for the planning, designing, and construction of an official residence for the Vice President of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to make a supplemental appropriation for the Administrator of General Services to enable him to plan, design, and construct an official residence for the Vice President of the United States in the District of Columbia.
